summary: Twenty-something Samantha searches for excitement and an elusive happiness, but finds sex and dissatisfaction instead.
cast: Stephanie Bennett|Jeramy Guillory|Billy Ray Gallion|Tom Vitorino|Laura Katz|Sean Michael Allen|Marnie Shelton|Matt Casado|Richie Magallanes|Niklaus Lange|Ringo Hayden|Liam Lockhart|Lyndon Johnson|Faleena Hopkins|Jay Webster|Kaye Moore|Terry Chisholm|John Chisholm|Jennifer Amy|Jonas Barrish|Gerry Katzman|James Franco|Barbara Jacques|Val Lauren|Cris Mancuso|Kenneth Moskow|Cristian Olave
title: Some Body
